name: The Backrooms: Beginning Of The Story
name_original: The Backrooms: Beginning Of The Story
description:
Start something that shouldn't have happened

The Backrooms: Beginning Of The Story - This is a 2D horror . 

In it you have to go through 4 levels in which secrets are hidden that are very hard to find.












P.S. this is just the beginning, I hope to make a continuation possible in 3D with the help of BotEgorchik. Wait
